itunes:title: What You Need to Know About Self Publishing
title: What You Need to Know About Self Publishing
description: Author and host, Bianca Marais,  chats with author, K.A. Tucker, who's gone from self publishing to traditional publishing, and then back again. Kathleen explores the pros and cons of both kinds of publishing; moving back and forth between genres; building your brand; reader loyalty and Bookstagrammers; and what you need to know if you're considering self publishing.
content:encoded: Author and host, Bianca Marais,  chats with author, K.A. Tucker, who's gone from self publishing to traditional publishing, and then back again. Kathleen explores the pros and cons of both kinds of publishing; moving back and forth between genres; building your brand; reader loyalty and Bookstagrammers; and what you need to know if you're considering self publishing.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais and K.A. Tucker
itunes:keywords: KA Tucker, Bianca Marais, self publishing, traditional publishing, pros and cons, changing genres, indie publishing
